subtitle: A good way of using up mashed potato and breadcrumbs.

method.text: Mix together salmon and sauce, potatoes, onion, lemon juice and season to taste. Shape into round flat cakes with floured hands. Dip in beaten egg. Coat with breadcrumbs.
Heat oil for deep frying. Fry fish cakes for 5-6 min or until golden brown. Drain on crumpled up kitchen paper. Serve piping hot.

title: Salmon fish cakes
